meanings.definition: An open space surrounded by walls or buildings.
meanings.sent1: The courtyard was a peaceful area with tall walls around it.
meanings.sent2: We sat in the courtyard, enjoying the sunshine and fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The courtyard was so quiet that even the birds tiptoed around.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a courtyard of thoughts, each one neatly contained within walls.
meanings.sent5: The courtyard felt like a secret garden hidden from the world.

meanings.definition: A space in front of a building.
meanings.sent1: The courtyard in front of the museum was filled with sculptures.
meanings.sent2: Students gathered in the courtyard before the school day started.
meanings.sent3: The courtyard seemed to be waiting for the building to tell it a secret.
meanings.sent4: His smile greeted her like the courtyard welcoming the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The courtyard stretched out like a welcoming mat in front of the grand mansion.
